name: Dizzy Drawing
description:
Dizzy drawing is a one-button drawing program/game. 

Controls:

The only button is X

While in drawing mode press X to begin drawing a line and Hold X to continue drawing

Double Tap X to move the pointer without drawing any lines

Pay attention to the dial in the bottom left; it determines the colour of the line that will be drawn

Game Modes:

Draw the Prompt:  You will be given 60 seconds to draw a prompt given to you by the game.  After 60 seconds you will be shown your work and be given an opportunity to save it.  There is no goal or grading system, just draw something cool!

Pictionary:  The person drawing will have to think of a prompt in their head and then begin drawing it.  While drawing, non-players watching have to guess as to what they think the person is drawing.  If someone guesses the prompt the person drawing can press ESC to finish the round.  If nobody guesses the prompt before the time limit then everybody loses.

Free Draw: There's no time limit in this game mode and no goal.  Just draw whatever you feel like and see how good of a work of art you can make.  Whenever you feel like you're done, just press ESC to finish, then you can save your work and return to the main menu.
